measure_points.query: SELECT count(*) from Transaction WHERE appName='QS' AND name='WebTransaction/Action/'
SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE error is true) as percentage from Transaction WHERE appName='QS' AND name='WebTransaction/Action/'
SELECT apdex(duration, t:0.5) FROM Transaction WHERE appName='QS' AND name='WebTransaction/Action/'
SELECT uniqueCount(session) as session FROM PageView WHERE appName='QS' AND name='WebTransaction/Action/'
SELECT count(*) FROM PageView WHERE appName='QS' AND name='WebTransaction/Action/' FACET session LIMIT MAX
